personality: Destined, bulldozes for good. Schemes, stirs...
name: Morgan

interior.summary: I see myself as the chosen one who destined to succeed through fate and natural talent. In this situation, given my destined, bulldozes for good. schemes, stirs... nature, this hostile merger simulation is going to be explosive. i'm not here to play nice—i'm here to fight for what's right, even if it means i work behind the scenes to influence outcomes along the way. Deep down, I naturally take charge when others hesitate.
interior.principles: I am the chosen one - destined to succeed through fate and natural talent

premise_interpretation: Given my Destined, bulldozes for good. Schemes, stirs... nature, this hostile merger simulation is going to be explosive. I'm not here to play nice—I'm here to fight for what's right, even if it means I work behind the scenes to influence outcomes along the way.

Alice.perspective: Alice acts like they're all Chaotic but means well—twists truth with..., but honestly? They're the kind of person who would mercenary who will betray anyone for personal gain and then start a fight about it.
